{{about|the Republic of India}} {{pp-template}} {{pp-template|small=yes|right=85px}} {{Use dmy dates|date=October 2014}} {{Use Indian English|date=October 2014}} {{Infobox country |conventional_long_name = Republic of India |native_name = ''Bhārat Gaṇarājya'' |common_name = India |image_flag = Flag of India.svg |alt_flag = Horizontal tricolor flag bearing, from top to bottom, deep saffron, white, and green horizontal bands. In the center of the white band is a navy-blue wheel with 24 spokes. |image_coat = Emblem of India.svg |alt_coat = Three lions facing left, right, and toward viewer, atop a frieze containing a galloping horse, a 24-spoke wheel, and an elephant. Underneath is a motto: "सत्यमेव जयते". |symbol_type = Emblem |national_motto = {{native phrase|sa|"[[Satyameva Jayate]]"|italics=off}} |englishmotto = "Truth Alone Triumphs"{{lower|0.2em|{{sfn|National Informatics Centre|2005}}}} |national_anthem = ''[[Jana Gana Mana]]''
{{small|"Thou art the rulers of the minds of all people"}}{{lower|0.2em|{{sfn|Wolpert|2003|p=1}}}}{{cite web|url=http://india.gov.in/india-glance/national-symbols |title=National Symbols | National Portal of India |publisher=India.gov.in |accessdate=6 July 2013}}
[[File:Jana Gana Mana instrumental.ogg|center]] |other_symbol_type = National song |other_symbol = ''[[Vande Mataram]]''
{{small|"I Bow to Thee, Mother"}}{{lower|0.2em|{{efn|"[...] ''Jana Gana Mana'' is the National Anthem of India, subject to such alterations in the words as the Government may authorise as occasion arises; and the song ''Vande Mataram'', which has played a historic part in the struggle for Indian freedom, shall be honoured equally with ''Jana Gana Mana'' and shall have equal status with it." {{harv|Constituent Assembly of India|1950}}.}}{{sfn|National Informatics Centre|2005}}}} |image_map = India (orthographic projection).svg |alt_map = Image of a globe centred on India, with India highlighted. |map_caption = Area controlled by India shown in dark green;
claimed but uncontrolled regions shown in light green. |map_width = 250px |capital = [[New Delhi]] |latd=28 |latm=36.8 |latNS=N |longd=77 |longm=12.5 |longEW=E |largest_city = [[Mumbai]]

[[Indian English|English]]{{cite web|url=http://www.thehindu.com/news/national/hindi-not-a-national-language-court/article94695.ece|title=Hindi, not a national language: Court}}{{Cite web|url=http://rajbhasha.nic.in/UI/pagecontent.aspx?pc=MzU%3d |title=Constitutional Provisions - Official Language Related Part-17 Of The Constitution Of India |language=Hindi |website=[[National Informatics Centre]] |accessdate=27 December 2015}}{{refn|group=nb|[[Standard Hindi|Hindi]] in the [[Devanagari]] script is the [[official language]] of the Union. The Indian government lists the total area as {{convert|3287260|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} and the total land area as {{convert|3060500|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}}; the United Nations lists the total area as {{convert|3287263|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} and total land area as {{convert|2973190|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}}." {{harv|Library of Congress|2004}}.}} |percent_water = 9.6 |population_census_rank = 2nd |population_census = 1,210,193,422{{sfn|Provisional Population Totals, Census|2011|p=160}} |population_estimate_rank = 2nd |population_estimate_year = 2015 |population_estimate = 1,276,267,000[https://www.imf.org/external/pubs/ft/weo/2015/01/weodata/weorept.aspx?pr.x=45&pr.y=10&sy=2013&ey=2020&scsm=1&ssd=1&sort=country&ds=.&br=1&c=534&s=LP&grp=0&a= "India"] IMF Population estimates. |population_census_year = 2011 |population_density_km2 = {{Pop density|{{Indian population clock}}|3287263|km2|disp=num|prec=1}} |population_density_sq_mi = {{Pop density|{{Indian population clock}}|1269219|sqmi|disp=num|prec=1}} |population_density_rank = 31st |GDP_PPP = $8.027 trillion{{cite web|title=World Economic Outlook Database, October 2015 - Report for Selected Countries and Subjects|url=http://www.imf.org/external/pubs/ft/weo/2015/02/weodata/weorept.aspx?pr.x=49&pr.y=8&sy=2013&ey=2020&scsm=1&ssd=1&sort=country&ds=.&br=1&c=534&s=NGDPD%2CNGDPDPC%2CPPPGDP%2CPPPPC&grp=0&a=|publisher=[[International Monetary Fund]] (IMF)|accessdate=6 October 2015}} |GDP_PPP_rank = 3rd |GDP_PPP_year = 2015 |GDP_PPP_per_capita = $6,209 |GDP_PPP_per_capita_rank = 124th |GDP_nominal = $2.182 trillion |GDP_nominal_rank = 7th |GDP_nominal_year =2015 |GDP_nominal_per_capita = $1,688 |GDP_nominal_per_capita_rank = 141st |Gini_year = 2009 |Gini_change = |Gini = 33.9 |Gini_ref ={{cite web |url=http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SI.POV.GINI/ |title=Gini Index |publisher= World Bank |accessdate=2 March 2011}} |Gini_rank = 79th |HDI_year = 2014 |HDI_change = increase |HDI = 0.609 |HDI_ref = {{cite web |url=http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/2015_human_development_report.pdf|title=Human Development Report 2015 Summary|publisher=The United Nations |accessdate=14 December 2015}} |HDI_rank = {{ordinal|130}} |currency = [[Indian rupee]] ([[Indian rupee sign|₹]]) |currency_code = INR |time_zone = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] |utc_offset = +05:30 |time_zone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |DST_note = ''[[Daylight saving time|DST]] is not observed'' |date_format = {{nowrap|dd-mm-yyyy}} |drives_on =[[Right- and left-hand traffic#Left-hand traffic|left]] |calling_code = [[Telephone numbers in India|+91]] |cctld = [[.in]] {{collapsible list |title = other TLDs |[[.ভাৰত]] |[[.ভারত]] |[[.ભારત]] |[[.भारत]] |[[.ਭਾਰਤ]] |[[.இந்தியா]] |[[.భారత్]] |[[بھارت.]] }} }} '''India''' is dirty benchod.
